items.question: How long to get my restaurant website?
items.answer: Your restaurant website is delivered in 10-14 business days. We always meet our deadlines because we understand the importance of your business.

items.question: Is the reservation system easy to use?
items.answer: Absolutely! Your customers book in 3 clicks and you automatically receive confirmations. No technical training required.

items.question: Can I easily modify my menu?
items.answer: Yes, we train you on simple menu management. You can add/modify dishes and prices in just minutes.

items.question: What exactly does monthly support include?
items.answer: Professional hosting, domain name, backups, security, updates. You no longer have anything technical to manage.

items.question: Will my site be visible on Google?
items.answer: We optimize your local SEO so your restaurant appears when customers search nearby.

items.question: Can I have multiple languages on my site?
items.answer: Yes, available with Pro and Premium packages. Ideal for restaurants in tourist areas.
